Science gets a new app

December 9, 2011 Tags: Communication Design Science

After long hours and late nights of watching online tutorials, fiddling with InDesign layouts, and waiting for Apple to get its act together (mostly by my classmate and karaoke partner Rose Eveleth), Scienceline has a new iPad app! Check it out at the iTunes store here, and read all about it here. We're super proud of it. Congrats to all!
